question:
Hello!

I think I have all the necessary achievements together :) Could you check this and confirm the degree if necessary? The title of the thesis and my personal details are all correctly entered on TUMOnline.

Best regards,
<ANONYMIZED>"
answer:
Hello,

As soon as your last grade is valid in TUMonline, you can contact your secretary so that she can request your certificate for you: cit.tum.de/cit/kontakte-studium-informatik/#c4432

Best regards
